title: Sweden to map obesity drug prescriptions after suspicious sales surge [Advocacy Lab]
summary_full: After a tripling of obesity drug sales in 2025 the Swedish government has ordered a review into the surge, suspecting incorrect prescribing and abuse of the health system
summary_public: After a tripling of obesity drug sales in 2025 the Swedish government has ordered a review into the surge, suspecting incorrect prescribing and abuse of the health system

SE.label: neutral
